response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price. My offer is $1,200,000. I understand that the product's worth to you might be different, but I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
